dmca.title: Orchid Photo Posted on Blog Generates 512 Notice
dmca.body:
[private]
Chicago, IL 60657
[private]

Google Inc.
Blogger DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
[private]

Attn: Blogger DMCA Complaints

12 February 2004

NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

1. The copyrighted material is located at the URL http://tigger.uic.edu/~shevlin/orchids.html. There is a copyright notice clearly posted at the bottom right corner of the page. The copyrighted material being infringed upon is the second photograph in the third row, which can be accessed by the URL http://tigger.uic.edu/~shevlin/pics/oncidium3.jpg.

2. The material infringing upon the copyrighted work is located at the URL http://celula.blogspot.com/ under the post dated February 3, 2004. The infringing material is the photograph, as noted in Section 1.

3. I may contacted about this infringement at the email address [private] Correspondence can also be addressed to [private], Chicago, IL 60657.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private]
